name: PollutionFacts
0:
”Alexa ask pollution facts to tell me a fact”
”Alexa start pollution facts”
”Alexa launch pollution facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pollution facts
des: These facts provide information about pollution which is a critical issue for our survival.If these statistics are enough to give a wake-up call, then even more needs to be done beyond that. Step ahead and stop pollution yourself, today.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
